main: Her skills trigger a {status:Discard} which sets her {status:KnowledgeExplored}.
Her {status:KnowledgeExplored} only buffs her S1 with Coin Power, so it's generally not worth worrying about the value too much.
other: All her skills give her {status:Aggro} and shields based on her {status:KnowledgeExplored} (before {status:Discard} changes it) and the rank of the skill that was discarded.
Her passive gives her {status:HitDamageUp} depending on the damage she took on the previous turn.

1090701.desc:
Gain [HitDamageUp] next turn based on the damage that this unit took this turn.
(Shield damage included in the calculation. Maxes out when taking damage equal to 25% of Max HP at turn start. Max [HitDamageUp] gained by this effect: 5)
If this unit has 3 [KnowledgeExplored] at the end of the turn, remove 1 negative effect applied to self
1090701.name: Incandescent Enlightenment

1090721.desc:
1 ally with the highest Max HP gains [HitDamageUp] next turn based on the damage that they took this turn.
(Shield damage included in the calculation. Maxes out when taking damage equal to 15% of Max HP at turn start. Max [HitDamageUp] gained by this effect: 3)
1090721.name: Missionary of Knowledge
